title: Why didn’t BTS’ V ever participate in one of Cypher’s parts? - Quora

response.answer_text: He is not classed as a rapper in the group, and for now it’s been RM, Suga, and J-Hope doing Cypher. When they preform on stage, V joins in at times and has even preformed Cypher pt.3 by himself, so you can check those things out. Many anticipate him being in Cypher pt.5 if one is released, so we’ll just have to wait.
Because he’s not part of the rapline.
